paraphrases.from sentence: Furthermore , the paraphrases generated by our system are well - formed , semantically sensible , and grammatically correct for the most part .

average metric.from sentence: When comparing our results with the state - of - the - art baseline , the average metric of the VAE - SVG model is able to give a 10 % absolute point performance improvement for the TER metric , a significant number with respect to the difference between the best and second best baseline which only stands at 2 % absolute point .

have.from sentence:
Those numbers are reported in the Measure column with row best - BLEU / best - METEOR . , we report the results for MSCOCO dataset .
As we can see , we have a significant improvement w.r.t. the baselines .

supervised model.from sentence: Both variations of our supervised model i.e. , VAE - SVG and VAE - SVG - eq perform better than the state - of - the - art with VAE - SVG performing slightly better than VAE - SVG - eq .

BLEU and METEOR.from sentence: For the BLEU and METEOR , our best results are 4.7 % and 4 % absolute point improvement over the state - of - the - art .

both variations.from sentence:
In , we report results for the Quora dataset .
As we can see , both variations of our model perform significantly better than unsupervised VAE and VAE - S , which is not surprising .

training data size.from sentence: We also report the results on different training sizes , and as expected , as we increase the training data size , results improve .

results.from sentence: Comparing the results across different variants of supervised model , VAE - SVG - eq performs the best .

generating paraphrases.from sentence: We also experimented with generating paraphrases through beam - search , and , unlike MSCOCO , it turns out that beam search improves the results significantly .

comparing.from sentence: When comparing the best variant of our model with unsupervised model ( VAE ) , we are able to get more than 27 % absolute point ( more than 3 times ) boost in BLEU score , and more than 19 % absolute point ( more than 2 times ) boost in METEOR ; and when comparing with VAE - S , we are able to get a boost of almost 19 % absolute points in BLEU ( 2 times ) and more than 10 % absolute points in METEOR ( 1.5 times ) .
